title: SDT-Based Intelligent Mathematics Learning Program for Student-Athletes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: Program targeting adult learners balancing academics and athletics, addressing time limitations and motivation sustainability through individualized learning pathways

learning_goals: Learners engage in self-directed learning activities at least three times weekly through SDT-based ITS
Learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in math problem-solving ability assessments by program completion
Learners show a 15% or greater improvement in autonomy, competence, and relatedness subscales on learning motivation scales
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
